definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[שׁמשׁ]] (√ of foll.; mng. unknown; NH = BH; Ph. [[שמש]]; As. šamšu; Aram. [[שִׁמְשָׁא]], 4em4o0, OAram., Palm. [[שמש]] Lzb:379; Ar. 4amsun, Sab. [[שמסם]] goddess, SabDenkm:20. 56 ff. DHM:B.u.S. 1032 Wkl:ZMG liv (1900), 408 ff. RS:K 299 Nö:ZMG xii (1887), 712).
